summary: This module implements a Flax-based linear multistep (LMS) scheduler for diffusion models using discrete beta schedules. It defines a scheduler class that handles configuration, state tracking, input scaling, LMS coefficient calculation, and sample updates across diffusion timesteps, along with a state container class.
business_intent: Provide a high-performance, configurable scheduler for JAX/Flax diffusion model inference, enabling fast and accurate sample generation in applications such as image synthesis, video generation, and other generative AI tasks.
